name: Andrzej Ito

My expertise extends to **TanStack** for state management and **Tailwind** for responsive design. I have a proven track record in dashboard development, UI/UX design, and ensuring compliance with **WCAG AA** accessibility standards, alongside optimizing for **PWA** performance. I excel at leading cross-functional teams and mentoring junior engineers while consistently delivering impactful projects that enhance user experience and drive technical excellence.
